languages.text: "Благодарю. Я уж боялся, что совсем растерял сноровку за годы проповедования, но, похоже, старые привычки парой-тройкой молитв не вытравить".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю. Я уж боялся, что совсем растерял сноровку за годы проповедования, но, похоже, старые привычки парой-тройкой молитв не вытравить".

languages.text: "Thank you. I was afraid I'd lost all my skill after years of preaching, but it looks like it takes more than a couple of prayers to kill off old habits."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю. Я уж боялся, что совсем растерял сноровку за годы проповедования, но, похоже, старые привычки парой-тройкой молитв не вытравить".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you. I was afraid I'd lost all my skill after years of preaching, but it looks like old habits don't die from a couple of prayers."
"Thank you. I was afraid I'd lost all my skill after years of preaching, but it looks like old habits don't die from a couple of prayers."
"Thank you. I was afraid I'd lost all my skill after years of preaching, but it looks like it takes more than a couple of prayers to kill off old habits."
"Thank you. I was afraid I'd lost all my skill after years of preaching, but it looks like it takes more than a couple of prayers to kill off old habits."
"Thank you. I was afraid I'd lost all my skill after years of preaching, but it looks like it takes more than a couple of prayers to kill off old habits."

languages.text: 「ありがとうございます。長年の説法によってすっかり私の腕も錆びついたかと恐れていましたが、古くからの習慣を捨て去るには、多少の祈りでは足りないようですね」
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I was afraid I'd lost all my skill after years of preaching, but it looks like it takes more than a couple of prayers to kill off old habits."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとうございます。長年の説法によってすっかり私の腕も錆びついたかと恐れていましたが、古くからの習慣を捨て去るには、多少の祈りでは足りないようですね」

languages.text: “谢谢。我本以为这么多年的布道让我忘记了怎么开枪，但看起来，几次祷告还不足以改掉以前的习惯。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I was afraid I'd lost all my skill after years of preaching, but it looks like it takes more than a couple of prayers to kill off old habits."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢。我本以为这么多年的布道让我忘记了怎么开枪，但看起来，几次祷告还不足以改掉以前的习惯。”

languages.text: « Merci. J'avais peur d'avoir perdu la main après avoir passé tant d'années à prêcher, mais manifestement, il faut plus que quelques prières pour perdre de vieilles habitudes. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I was afraid I'd lost all my skill after years of preaching, but it looks like it takes more than a couple of prayers to kill off old habits."

traits.locale_text: « Merci. J'avais peur d'avoir perdu la main après avoir passé tant d'années à prêcher, mais manifestement, il faut plus que quelques prières pour perdre de vieilles habitudes. »

languages.text: «Gracias. Pensaba que había perdido mi instinto tras años de prédica, pero parece que no bastan un par de plegarias para perder las viejas costumbres».
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I was afraid I'd lost all my skill after years of preaching, but it looks like it takes more than a couple of prayers to kill off old habits."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias. Pensaba que había perdido mi instinto tras años de prédica, pero parece que no bastan un par de plegarias para perder las viejas costumbres».

languages.text: "Danke. Ich hatte Angst, ich hätte nach all den Jahren des Predigens meine Fähigkeiten verloren, aber offenbar legt man alte Gewohnheiten mit ein paar Gebeten nicht ab."
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I was afraid I'd lost all my skill after years of preaching, but it looks like it takes more than a couple of prayers to kill off old habits."

traits.locale_text: "Danke. Ich hatte Angst, ich hätte nach all den Jahren des Predigens meine Fähigkeiten verloren, aber offenbar legt man alte Gewohnheiten mit ein paar Gebeten nicht ab."

languages.text: "Teşekkür ederim. Yıllarca vaaz verince paslandığımdan korkuyordum. Demek ki ne kadar dua etsen de eski huylar öyle kolay yok olmuyormuş."
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I was afraid I'd lost all my skill after years of preaching, but it looks like it takes more than a couple of prayers to kill off old habits."

traits.locale_text: "Teşekkür ederim. Yıllarca vaaz verince yeteneğimi kaybettiğimden korkuyordum. Demek ki birkaç duayla eski huylardan kurtulmak mümkün olmuyormuş."
